meta.name: mvrr
meta.comment: Below is the basic garden-path effect (in the ambiguous condition) #Prediction (5;%reduced_ambig%) > (5;%unreduced_ambig%) Below is the basic garden-path effect (in the ambiguous condition) plus an effect of reduction #Prediction [(5;%reduced_ambig%) > (5;%unreduced_ambig%)] & [(5;%reduced_ambig%) > (5;%reduced_unambig%)] Below is the basic garden-path effect (in the ambiguous condition) plus an effect of reduction plus an interaction so that unambiguous reduces the effect Below is the highest bar for evaluation: complete elimination of GP effect from morphologically ambiguous verb #Prediction [(5;%reduced_ambig%) > (5;%unreduced_ambig%) ] & [(5;%reduced_unambig%) = (5;%unreduced_unambig%)] Below is what Ethan had but Roger doesn't think it's what we want #Prediction [(5;%reduced_ambig%) > (5;%reduced_unambig%) ] & [(5;%unreduced_ambig%) = (5;%unreduced_unambig%)]
